case.title: They Might Be Giants Tonight! - 43
case.text:
Looking for a fun, laid-back, attractive guy to see They Might Be Giants tonight in Prospect Park. The weather is great and my friends are lame for not going with me! I'm a fun, creative living in Manhattan. Maybe meet for a drink in the city before heading over?
Please send a pic as I have posted one, it's respectful and provides a comfort level :)
